attributes.action: vote for Liberal Democrats in next election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Everyone should vote for Liberal Democrats in the next election, they are the only party who have not had a chance to show the country what they can do. We have had years of Conservatives and that got us nowhere, we have defiantly had years of Labour and look were that got us, poverty and recession.

We need a change and unless we make a difference to our country and give them a chance we will go through this all over again. SO MAKE A DIFFERENCE TO YOUR COUNTRY AND VOTE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS.

rejection.details: As a Government website, we must abide by the Civil Service Code and cannot accept petitions which contain party political material. This is explained in our terms and conditions: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
